issue.title: [C++][Compute] Improve memory efficiency in Grouper
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17129](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17129). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are APIs in arrow::compute::Grouper (GetUniques, Consume) which may be able to be refactored to write into preallocated memory or otherwise have a mode that does less mandatory allocation. We can investigate at some point
